001package imagingbook.lib.math.testing;
002
003import java.util.Random;
004
005import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
006import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
007
008import imagingbook.lib.math.MahalanobisDistance;
009import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
010import imagingbook.lib.math.Statistics;
011
012public class MahalanobisTest2 {
013                
014        static final int N = 1000;
015        static final double[] Sigma = {2, 5, 3};
016        static final double[] Mu    = {0, -1, 1};
017        static final int K = Sigma.length;
018
019        public static void main(String[] args) {
020                
021                double[][] samples = makeSamples();
022                MahalanobisDistance mhd = new MahalanobisDistance(samples);
023        
024                double[] mu = mhd.getMeanVector();
025                System.out.println("mu = (sample mu)\n" + Matrix.toString(mu));
026                System.out.println();
027
028                // covariance matrix cov (3x3)
029                double[][] cov = mhd.getCovarianceMatrix();
030                System.out.println("cov = (sample covariance matrix)\n" + Matrix.toString(cov));
031                System.out.println();
032                
033                double[][] icov =  mhd.getInverseCovarianceMatrix();
034                System.out.println("icov = (inverse covariance matrix)\n" + Matrix.toString(icov)); 
035                System.out.println();
036                
037                RealMatrix U = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(mhd.getWhiteningTransformation());
038                System.out.println("U = (whitening transformation)\n" + Matrix.toString(U.getData()));
039                System.out.println();
040                
041                RealMatrix UTU = U.transpose().multiply(U);
042                System.out.println("UT*U = (must be same as icov)\n" + Matrix.toString(UTU.getData()));
043                System.out.println();
044                
045                double[][] whitened = whiten(samples, U);
046                double[][] covW = Statistics.covarianceMatrix(whitened, false);
047                System.out.println("covW = (ovariance matrix of whitened samples must be close to identity)\n" + Matrix.toString(covW));
048
049        }
050        
051        static double[][] makeSamples() {
052                Random rd = new Random(77);
053                double[][] s = new double[N][K];
054                for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
055                        for (int k = 0; k < K; k++) {
056                                s[i][k] = Sigma[k] * rd.nextGaussian() + Mu[k];
057                        }
058                }
059                return s;
060        }
061        
062        static double[][] whiten(double[][] samples, RealMatrix U) {
063                double[][] whitened = new double[samples.length][];
064                for (int i = 0; i < samples.length; i++) {
065                        whitened[i] = U.operate(samples[i]);
066                }
067                return whitened;
068        }
069        
070}
071
